pages.title: Gray-Banded Kingsnake
pages.text: The gray-banded kingsnake ($(o)Lampropeltis alterna$()), sometimes referred to as the alterna or the Davis Mountain king snake, is a species of nonvenomous snake in the family Colubridae.$(br2)The species is endemic to the southwestern United States and adjacent Mexico.

pages.title: Gray-Banded Kingsnake
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:rabbit$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
